author: badguy_op
content:
i am new to rollups so my apologies 

Question-do rollups pay gas fees on l1 chain

author: Deleted User
content: yes. but the point is you share the fee with others so it becomes smaller

author: Deleted User
content: for example on arbitrum you only have to pay $3 to do a transaction instead of $10 if you just used l1

author: badguy_op
content: <@456226577798135808> what about immutable x they dont have any gas fee

author: Deleted User
content: i honestly havent checked them out. and there doesent seem to be alot of community support for them so im wondering why that is.

author: t0biiiiii
content:
Afaik the gas fee gets subsidized by immutablex
so they're paying your gas fee
but since you have to pay 2% protocol fee for trades, it not really 'free'
